Content: Some-FTL mediums may use different graphs than the original map. Ss
there is a FTL-plane or something. Systems might then be mapped to this
plane with different methods (e.g. hashing the systems coordinates and
interpreting the hash as coordinates in the new plane). This may result
in interesting assymetries between polities using different forms of
FTL, especially if two mediums with different planes permit permit
different kinds of travel (e.g. one only permits gates while another
